title: Ukrainian Forces Work to Secure Kherson City
description: The Ukrainian military said it was clearing left-behind mines and explosives, while still battling Russian forces on its outskirts.
dc:creator: The New York Times
media:credit: Lynsey Addario for The New York Times
media:description: Ukrainian soldiers on Friday in a former Russian base filled with mortar rounds, ammunition and discarded uniforms in the Kherson region of southern Ukraine.
